title: font ID help - similar to Avant Garde
content:
can anyone identify this font? it's similar to Avant Garde, but A and N different. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fashion\_night\_out.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175931/http:/typophile.com/files/fashion_night_out.jpg) | 28.82 KB |
author: andy goldman

comments.content: The "A" "N" and "1" are almost identical to [but others are not even close. :(](http://web.archive.org/)
I found it!! it's called: " ITC Avant Garde Gothic Bold Pro Font"
